summary: Ability to disable/enable map scaling on last zoom level by Pinch-To-Zoom on last zoom level.

comments.content: It should be possible to enable/disable map scaling on last zoom level (e.g. 18 for CloudMade tiles) by Pinch-To-Zoom.

I don't understand what you're asking for. Please can you describe it a bit better.

And is it an enhancement or a bug?

When map is shown on last zoom level (e.g. 18th zoom lvl), it is still possible to scale the map by pinch-to-zoom. But as soon as you release fingers from the screen, map is invalidated without scaling. I propose to disable this behavior, so user couldn't scale the map on the last zoom level (nothing should happen when user performs pinch-to-zoom on last zoom level).
Seems to be a low priority bug.
This issue was closed by revision r764.
